divs: Sighting Detailsmy boyfriend and I were sailing out on klamath lake enjoying the beautiful hot weather, it was getting dark, so we decided to find a cove and anchor the boat and have a late dinner..when we noticed 2 lights in the sky,one was orange and one was green, we realized they werent lights but discs..so I ran below to get my camera so i could take some pictures, by the time i got back up on deck about 2 minutes later, they were gone..I really wish I could have gotten a picture..they were gone as fast as we had noticed them...
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Klamath Falls
There were no other sightings in Klamath Falls on or around May 27th 2007
Summary: My boyfriend and I were out sailing on the Klamath Lake, we saw 2 discs one green and one orange.
